page.title: 18A WEEK'S MENU
page.content: A WEEK'S MENU FOR A YOUNG FAMILY. {MON:}BREAKFAST,PORRIDGE LUNCH BREAD & CHEESE & FRUIT SUPPER CHICKEN RISOTTO YOGHOURT {TUES}BREAKFAST CERALS & TOAST LUNCH SPAGHETTI & CHEESE SUPPER LENTIL TOAD IN THE HOLE {WED }BREAKFAST CEREALS & TOAST LUNCH BREAD & SOUP SUPPER SAUSAGES & BAKED POTATOES FRUIT & ICECREAM {THUR }BREAKFAST CEREALS & TOAST LUNCH SARDINES ON TOAST, FRESH FRUIT, A BUN SUPPER TUONI ET LAMPI (CHICK PEAS) BAKED APPLES & CUSTARD ETC. {THIS SORT OF DIET IS BECOMING MORE {COMMON AMONG THE NON CORNISH YOUNG {FAMILIES. THE CORNISH STILL EAT A DIET {OF MEAT & 2 VEG, IN A WIDE VARIETY OF {FORMS.PASTIES ARE STILL MADE & ARE {VERY GOOD. }
